alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:54AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Taylor County through 245 AM CDT... At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shep, or near Happy Valley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merkel, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Coronados Camp, View, Caps, Happy Valley, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa and Shep. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 267 and 268. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
